# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure.

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel before use.
- Regularly check the status of burner entities to avoid EntityStatus.NO_FUEL errors.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before use.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS errors.

### Errors when using entities without being connected to a network
- Ensure that entities are properly connected to a network before use.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED errors.

### Errors when using entities without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly plugged into an electric network before use.
- Regularly check the status of entities to avoid EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK errors.

### Errors when using transport belts without items
- Ensure that transport belts have items to transport before use.
- Regularly check the status of transport belts to avoid EntityStatus.EMPTY errors.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
